name: Squash The Creeps 3D
description:
Squash the Creeps!

Very self-explanatory.

Uh, use WASD or Arrow keys to swim around and stuff and use space bar to jump.

You  can squash the creeps, just jump on one. Don't let them run into you though.

Experience is 138.3772468% better if you use a controller. Connect one of those bad boys up and use left joystick to move, and bottom button (E.G. A on Xbox, B on nintendo, etc, etc...) 

Download and unzip the -win file for windows computers and download+unzip the -lin folder for linux computers.

Sorry mac users, that's just the way it goes...
